body:
Comment 1: 
This is unfortunate, but I think it will need to wait until after Go 1.
The line number code predates the //line annotations and does not
realize the possibility of code being from different files.
The line number code is also very subtle, and I don't think I want 
to take a chance on rewriting it this close to the Go 1 release.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
